title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 104.2 - Female parole and conditional release violators
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 104.2 - Female parole and conditional release violators

State Regulations

Any female person to be returned to an institution under the
jurisdiction of the department for violation of parole or conditional or other
release is to be returned to the Bedford Hills Correctional Facility or the

Bayview Correctional Facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
104.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
